dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: You look different. Or maybe I'm seeing differently.

dialogue.speaker: Mirror Evan
dialogue.text: Both. We've always been having this conversation, haven't we?

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Every morning. But I only just started listening.

dialogue.speaker: Mirror Evan
dialogue.text: The eyes that see, the seen, and the seeingâ€”all one movement.

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: Sometimes I forget which side of the glass I'm on.

dialogue.speaker: Mirror Evan
dialogue.text: Perfect. Keep forgetting. That's when you remember what you really are.

actions.action: stands before bathroom mirror in morning ritual made conscious
reflects not just image but awareness itself, eyes holding infinite depth
plays across the glass, creating halos and shadows that suggest other dimensions
sometimes leads the movement, sometimes follows, boundaries dissolving

environment.description: Bathroom mirror becoming portal, daily grooming transformed into dialogue with self
environment.mood: intimate philosophy, playful non-duality, ordinary mysticism
